indexer.title: Indexer.
indexer.description1: The indexer is a Go-based service that scans synchronized repositories and pre-generates directory listings.
indexer.description2: It produces both <0>.html</0> and <1>.json</1> index files, enabling fast static delivery and programmatic access without per-request processing.

webServer.title: Web Server.
webServer.description1: The web server is powered by <0>nginx</0> and serves package files, pre-generated indexes, and frontend assets.
webServer.description2: By serving static content directly, it delivers high performance and consistent response times, even for very large directories.

syncRepo.title: SyncRepo.
syncRepo.description1: SyncRepo is a shell-based synchronization process that mirrors upstream repositories to each Kubernetes node.
syncRepo.description2: After syncing completes, it automatically triggers the indexer to regenerate directory listings, ensuring content stays up to date.
